Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can accurately draw a string telephone setup between two students, showing clear understanding of the task.
The student can illustrate all important components clearly, such as the cups and the string, including appropriate labels.
The student can show the string being taut, facilitating the transmission of sound, perhaps with directional arrows indicating sound travel.
The student can depict a scenario where two students use the string telephone to communicate over a distance, demonstrating a solution to the problem presented.
The student can include an explanation or visual cue of how long-distance communication benefits people through technology, such as including a small note about people talking over long distances.
CANNOT: The student is unlikely to have noticeable conceptual gaps, but might occasionally omit very minor details, such as additional background elements that add context but are not crucial to understanding the main concept.
